page.title: 16GAME FACTORY
page.content: Seven years ago the Frans Buitelaar Game Factory was built on the out_ skirts of Letham to process game from the glens of Angus and Perthshire and from Aberdeenshire.Rabbits are snared, deer,hares,pigeons,pheasants,grouse and wild-fowl are shot.The game is brought in in small amounts privately, or by game dealers in larger amounts. The game is processed,quick_frozen and exported to Germany,Holland,France Italy,Belgium and Scandinavia via Dover or Felixstowe in refrigerated trucks. August to February is the busy season and the 10 permanent workers from Letham and Forfar are increased to 15. The deer and rabbit skins are tanned and used in making leather goods in England. The Dutch parent company is based in Boston,Lincolnshire.
